description:
Migrate Database Schema from Public to RouteIQ

Update the application's database references to use the `routeiq` schema instead of the default `public` schema for all database operations.

Requirements:
- Update all database queries, models, and ORM configurations to reference `routeiq` schema
- Ensure proper schema qualification for the following tables:
  - clients
  - services
  - vehicles
- Update any database connection configurations or initialization scripts to set default schema
- Verify all CRUD operations work correctly against the new schema
- Update any raw SQL queries to include schema prefix (e.g., `routeiq.clients` instead of `clients`)
- Check for and update any migration files or seeding scripts
- Ensure foreign key relationships work across the schema
- Test all database-dependent features to confirm successful migration
- Update any database utility functions or helpers that assume `public` schema

Edge Cases to Consider:
- Existing data in `public` schema (if migration of data is needed, clarify with stakeholder)
- Mixed references where some tables might still need to reference `public` schema
- Database views or stored procedures that may reference the old schema
- Any third-party integrations or tools that expect `public` schema
title: Migrate database schema from public to routeiq
